attributes.action: If students have to wear a uniform teachers should too
attributes.additional_details: In schools students aren't allowed makeup, jewellery, smartwatches yet teachers will wear these things during lessons which I find as oppressive, hypocritical and discrimatory.
attributes.background: Make either teachers follow the same conduct as students or have no uniforms or restrictions for what students wear (within reason don't show up in underwear)

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about rules regarding the appearance of school staff are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ban school uniforms in English schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607158

Ban schools from setting rules about personal appearance of students: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/611540
